title: A liuing sadnes, in duty consecrated to the immortall memory of our late deceased albe-loued soueraigne lord, the peeereles paragon of princes, Iames, King of great Brittaine, France and Ireland Who departed this life at his mannour of Theobalds, on Sunday last, the 27. of March, 1625. By Iohn Taylor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: Printed by E. Allde for H. Gosson,
notes: The first and last pages are mourning pages.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
